functions.name: find_related_accounts
functions.description: Find accounts related to a given account through various relationship types and connection paths.

account_id.description: The ID of the source account to find relationships for

relationship_types.description: Types of relationships to search: parent, child, partner, vendor, competitor

max_depth.description: Maximum degrees of separation to search (1-4)

functions.name: analyze_account_hierarchy
functions.description: Analyze the organizational hierarchy and structure for an account or account family.

root_account_id.description: The ID of the root/parent account to analyze

include_subsidiaries.description: Whether to include subsidiary companies in the analysis

hierarchy_levels.description: Number of hierarchy levels to traverse

functions.name: discover_connection_paths
functions.description: Discover connection paths between two accounts and analyze relationship strength.

source_account_id.description: The ID of the source account

target_account_id.description: The ID of the target account

max_path_length.description: Maximum length of connection paths to find

include_contact_connections.description: Whether to include connections through shared contacts

functions.name: find_similar_accounts
functions.description: Find accounts similar to a given account based on industry, size, location, or other attributes.

reference_account_id.description: The ID of the reference account to find similar accounts for

similarity_criteria.description: Criteria for similarity: industry, size, location, revenue, employee_count

limit.description: Maximum number of similar accounts to return

functions.name: analyze_network_influence
functions.description: Analyze the network influence and centrality of an account within its business network.

account_id.description: The ID of the account to analyze network influence for

network_scope.description: The scope of the network to analyze

influence_metrics.description: Influence metrics to calculate: centrality, connectivity, reach
